title: This is the chat that got me permanently banned... ??? Too Harsh??????
body:
Riot today decided to issue me a permanent ban after a I was reported for using harsh language in a game. I take it a bot reads the chat logs first because I was in a 4v5 with a troll and i feel like its fair for context to be understood in these games before issuing PERMANENT BANS.    My support was stealing my CS the entire game and feeding, this caused one of our other teammates to quit hence the 4v5. The game continues and I'm letting out some of my anger in chat cause i'm angry i'm stuck with a troll. Pretty normal. 


I get that I used harsh language. But I do not think what I said warrants a PERMANENT BAN especially given the circumstances. Everyone in  ranked is just trying to advance and to get stuck in a game with a troll and then get PERMANENTLY BANNED for it is rather egregious.

If what you learn from this is to not use zero tolerance language, your accounts will still end up permanently banned. It will take longer because the punishments won't be automatically escalated, but it will have the same destination.

1) Use chat to help your team win the game. 

2) Don't complain about the past. Time travel is stupidly expensive. No one is going to go change the past for you. So, it's only useful to talk about what to do NEXT.

3) If someone is trolling, don't engage with them. Trolls get sexually excited when you get upset at them. Don't help them get off.

------------------------
The punishment ladder goes:

Starting Position
10 Game Chat Restriction
25 Game Chat Restriction
14 Day Ban
Permanent Ban

When a punishment is issued, the next punishment in the list is given. Trolling is a 14 day ban on the first offense, as is using Zero Tolerance language. Punishment tiers do reset with time and games played with _good_ behavior. It takes 3 to 6 months of regularly playing with good behavior to reduce one penalty tier.

You may not think you should be punished for your behavior, but Riot thinks you should. Given that they told you what behavior they'd ban you for several times already, you shouldn't be surprised that you got banned after engaging in that behavior.

On your 14 day ban reform card it CLEARLY said that the next offense would lead to a permanent suspension

You don't get insta perma banned for the 1st offense. So if someone was saying harsh things to you, they might've gotten chat restricted, 14 day banned or perma banned. You have no way of knowing what punishment they got
Also, 1 week bans don't exist. 14 day ban is the shortest ban

After your 14days ban , it clearly says if you are toxic one more time no matter how much the punishment is gonna be Pernament. So yeah , you are responsible for your own behaviour , Riot gave you a lot of chances to change but you didnt used them so you lost your account. Good luck buddy!
